title: Starboard Loses Effort to Gain Huntsman Board Seats
sub_head: The activist hedge fund has an 8.8% stake in the chemical company
body:
Activist hedge fund Starboard Value LP’s efforts to gain a presence on the board of chemical producer Huntsman Corp. have failed.
Starboard, which has an 8.8% stake in the company, was seeking four board seats, but Huntsman said shareholders had elected the company’s 10-member slate of nominees, based on preliminary vote results.
